DOC.brief_summary: To confirm safety pharmacokinetics maraviroc follow single oral dose 300 mg maraviroc healthy male Japanese volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Of Safety And Pharmacokinetics Following A Single Oral Dose Of 300 Mg Maraviroc In Healthy Male Japanese Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male Japanese subject age 21 50 year inclusive . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 45 kg . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . Positive result HIV , Hepatitis B surface antigen ( HbsAg ) HCV antibody . Hypersensitivity/allergic reaction component maraviroc , include soy lecithin .
